info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bradford County through 530 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Covington, or over Mansfield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Towanda, Canton, West Franklin, Troy, Sheshequin, Ulster, North Towanda, Springfield and West Burlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Pennsylvania.
